text: Melani Olivares in 2016 Melani Olivares Mora (born 18 February 1973 in Badalona, Barcelona, Spain) is a Spanish actress. Among her extensive credits is Quédate, a short film for which she won the Best Actress award at VI Certamen Nacional de Cortos de Dos Hermanas. ==Films== * La niña de tus sueños (1995) * Me da igual (2000) * No te fallaré (2001) * Noche de reyes (2001) * No dejaré que no me quieras (2002) * Agujeros en el cielo (2004) * Shevernatze un ángel corrupto (2007) * 8 citas (2008) * Temporal (2013) * Dos a la carta (2014) * Crisis (2014) ==External links== Category:Spanish actresses Category:1973 births Category:Living people
title: Melani Olivares
